data.text: @Sanjay_Pinto @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand Hi Sanjay, surely a nice tribute to our college batch mate Benedict.....
@Sanjay_Pinto @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand Which batch  was the Winner please ?
@Sanjay_Pinto @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand Super thing u have done in memory of Benadict daa. Great job
@kcvblr @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand Thanks buddy. You too can carry a piece on this.
@Sanjay_Pinto @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand Ya Sanjay, lovely gesture by you old boys and DB
@Sanjay_Pinto @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand And our batchmate at Loyola, Sanjay, gone too soon....

@Sanjay_Pinto @DeccanChronicle @dbppa @KartiPC @sumanthraman @Dayanidhi_Maran @Udhaystalin @Dr_Ezhilan @dmkathiranand Wow Sanjay you reminded me of my school cricket days. How come I did not know this event. This was the most popular sports event in Chennai those days.
